/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the landscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
